ygData.subject: Research different for each class?
ygData.msgSnippet: I did a bit of research with my level 16 necro at the time. My enchanter is still level 8 but from what I ve read so far, the research seems to work in a very
ygData.messageBody:
I did a bit of research with my level 16 necro at the time. My enchanter is
still level 8 but from what I've read so far, the research seems to work in
a very different way. Has anybody tried research with mages and wizards? is
it different also?
for necros, it's based on words ( like Word of divination ) that you need to
combine and for Enchanters, it seems to be based on pages of Lost Books that
need to be restored.
